setting.location: Personal quarters aboard research station orbiting planet Solaris
setting.weather: Artificial atmosphere now feeling dreamlike and untrustworthy

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair unkempt, face showing terror mixed with desperate hope, trembling hands
characters.clothing: Station uniform still disheveled from earlier violence, collar torn
characters.position: Standing frozen in doorway, gripping door frame with white knuckles
characters.action: Staring in disbelief and growing terror at impossible sight, body rigid with conflicting emotions of hope and horror

characters.appearance: Woman, late 20s, dark hair perfectly arranged as before, no trace of previous violence or trauma
characters.clothing: Same simple dress, pristine and unchanged despite recent events
characters.position: Sitting in exact same position on bed edge as hours before
characters.action: Looking up with same calm expression, as if nothing violent had occurred, presence defying all physical laws

scene.mainElements: Personal quarters restored to same impossible state as morning, no evidence of struggle or violence, reality seeming to reset itself
scene.details: Room appearing exactly as before violent episode, man's belongings in same positions, no trace of torn fabric or struggle, lighting identical to first encounter, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Station architecture unchanged, porthole showing same alien planet view, normal technological environment continuing as if violence never happened
scene.atmosphere: Horror at impossibility of return, complete breakdown of cause and effect, reality becoming fluid and untrustworthy, terror mixed with unwilling hope

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot capturing both character's shock and impossible presence
composition.focus: Contrast between man's terror and woman's unchanged calm
composition.depth: Terrified character in doorway foreground, impossible figure in middle ground, normal station background emphasizing surreal impossibility

colorPalette.usageNotes: Cool tones dominate with pops of vibrant neon lighting

lineArt.texture: smooth digital, hard edges on tech

lighting.intensity: high contrast (bright neon vs deep shadow)
lighting.highlights: lens flares, neon glows on surfaces

rendering.texture: smooth with textured brushes for atmosphere
rendering.detailLevel: high in focal points (tech details), looser elsewhere

perspective: dynamic perspective (wide-angle vistas or low-angle hero shots)
